alert.note: Alert for Clay; Putnam; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 4:00PM EDT until April 17 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ST. JOHNS...NORTHEASTERN PUTNAM AND EAST CENTRAL CLAY COUNTIES... At 400 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Picolata, or 8 miles north of Hastings, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hastings, Bostwick, Federal Point, Picolata, Spuds, Bakersville and Elkton. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
